analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Units.buyUnit (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#178-201):
	External calls:
	- unitDiscount = clans.getPlayersClanUpgrade(msg.sender,1) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#188-190)
	- goo.updatePlayersGooFromPurchase(msg.sender,reducedGooCost) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#193)
	- goo.mintGoo(seventyFivePercentRefund,this) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#193)
	- army.depositSpentGoo(reducedGooCost - seventyFivePercentRefund) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#194-198)
	- mintUnit(unitId,amount,msg.sender,position) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#199-201)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- unitsOwned (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#199-201)

Reentrancy in Units.mintUnit (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#115-147):

latestUpgradeOwnedForColumn in Units.buyUpgrade (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#418-419) is a local variable never initialiazed

Units.sellUnit (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#202-213) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-goo.transfer(msg.sender,(gooCost * amount * 3) / 4) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf936aa9e1f22c915abf4a66a5a6e94eb8716ba5e.sol#211-213)
